title: The Mathematical Proof of the Existence of Santa Claus

media:group.media:title: The Mathematical Proof of the Existence of Santa Claus
media:group.media:description:
Does Santa Claus exist?  In this video, I use mathematics to prove that he does.  In the process, we will explore many different aspects of mathematical proof writing and the importance of rigor.

Discord: https://discord.gg/3Zj59zA2Rg

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sudgylacmoe

Patreon Supporters:
AxisAngles
Bill Six
Couspar
Richard Penner

Sections:
00:00 Introduction
01:20 Proof With Algebra
03:24 Proof With Derivatives
04:16 Proof With Integrals
05:08 Proof With Limits
06:40 Proof With Rational Numbers
08:49 Discussion on Rigor
12:35 Revisiting the Proof With Algebra
14:11 Revisiting the Proof With Derivatives
16:40 Revisiting the Proof With Integrals
19:24 Revisiting the Proof With Limits
20:24 Revisiting the Proof With Rational Numbers
22:50 Conclusion
